description: Previously had to install via rpm files. I'm new a linux, so it was difficult to get it to work. At least now it installs correctly. Had to use my printers IP address to connect to it.
summary: At least I can print now

description:
I have already installed this "HP Linux Printing and Imaging System"
under several different Linux distros and so far it has consistently functioned to allow basic printing functions. The only requirement is
that your printer be connected in some way to your computer wether it be by cable, wifi, or in the network.

jm
Great app otherwise but when ever i try to add network connected device through usb option it fails always on every distro ive tried
Depuis que je suis passé à la version 2018 d'Ubuntu HPLIP ne s'ouvre plus alors qu'il est soit disant installé?
L'interface graphique est plutôt bonne, mais, par derrière, HPlib lui-même ne communique pas si bien que ça avec l'imprimante.
Без этой программы принтер на отрез отказывался печатать
